title: Urgent notice to teachers, principals
body_lines: Although the Education Ministry has declared today as a school holiday, the Ministry requested the staff relevant to the GCE (O/L) examination to report for the prescribed duties as previously assigned, examinations Department Commissioner General L.M.D. Dharmasena said.
He further requested the principals of all schools used as examination halls to report today and assist in the duties of preparing the examination halls.

It is suggested that arrangements be made to hold this year's Observer Advisory Meeting on Zoom Technology due to the fuel crisis and, if there is any other urgent need, it is requested to give notice before the commencement of the examination on Monday (23). (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
